sources.title: RoadShow1941
sources.description: Drogo Gaines is a rich playboy with a gold digger after him. He escapes marriage by faking insanity. But when he wakes up he finds they have put him in an asylum. Mystic Nights Videos

sources.title: Road Show (1941) ADOLPHE MENJOU
sources.description:
Stars: Adolphe Menjou, Carole Landis, Marjorie Woodworth 
Director: Hal Roach

A rich playboy, in imminent danger of marrying a gold digger, escapes by feigning insanity. But the joke's on him when he wakes up in an asylum full of comical lunatics! Based on the novel by Eric Hatch, who also wrote "1101 Park Avenue" which was the basis of "My Man Godfrey."

sources.title: Road Show (1941) Classic Comedy, Musical Movie
sources.description:
Gay with girls! Goofy with gags!
Rich playboy Drogo Gaines is in imminent danger of marrying a gold digger, and escapes by feigning insanity. The joke's on him when he wakes up in an asylum full of comical lunatics. 

Director: Hal Roach
Writers: Eric Hatch, Arnold Belgard
Stars: Adolphe Menjou, Carole Landis, John Hubbard 
Genres: Comedy, Music

metadata.Plot: Rich playboy Drogo Gaines is in imminent danger of marrying a gold digger, and escapes by feigning insanity. The joke's on him when he wakes up in an asylum full of comical lunatics. There he befriends Colonel Carraway, and together they escape, catching a ride with a beautiful blonde who proves to be Penguin Moore, carnival owner. The adventures of Drogo and the Colonel with Moore's Carnival are replete with Hal Roach slapstick.
metadata.Writer: Eric Hatch, Arnold Belgard, Harry Langdon
metadata.Actors: Adolphe Menjou, Carole Landis, John Hubbard
